sections.title: Discord Login Persistence
sections.description: Logging in to the website now saves between browser sessions, so you stay logged in! Also the user profile page works now :)

sections.title: About Page
sections.description: Guides for using the site are now displayed for user benefit, as well as general info about the project, its updates, and its ~~creature~~ creator.

sections.title: Display Themes
sections.description: We have Dark and Light mode!! For photosensitive users, there has been an alert added to the profile page to stick with light mode for no render flashing.
